name: Reforestation
description:
This is a game developed in just a week for Polish Game Jam: "Zostań w domu rób gry" (Stay home and make games). Theme for this game jam is "reconstruction". We decided to make a game about a forester who is responsible for taking care of a forest and keep it out of dangers of any kind. So, main goal of our project is to keep the trees from fire, disarm animal traps and chop down burnt trees. 

All graphic assets and main music theme were made completely by members of the team. Sound effects were taken from: https://opengameart.org/content/items-door-fire-weapon-hits (thank you very much!)

Controls:

WSAD or arrows - movement

E or Space - "use" button"
